markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Dust Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=2388)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Nonlethal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=188" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 265

**Domain**
[Dust](/Domains.aspx?ID=107)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot [burst](/Rules.aspx?ID=2385)

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call forth a swirling storm of dust. The dust storm obscures vision, as the effects of mist. The dust also makes the air unbreathable; creatures in the area must [hold their breath](/Rules.aspx?ID=2439), though wearing a scarf or similar clothing over the mouth increases the time the creature can hold its breath by 5 rounds. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the dust storm take 1d6 slashing damage. Creatures that have the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732) trait or that are made primarily of liquid take double damage.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Dust Storm

text: Dust Storm Two Actions Source Divine Mysteries pg. 265 Domain Dust Range 120 feet Area 20-foot burst Duration 1 minute --- You call forth a swirling storm of dust. The dust storm obscures vision, as the effects of mist. The dust also makes the air unbreathable; creatures in the area must hold their breath, though wearing a scarf or similar clothing over the mouth increases the time the creature can hold its breath by 5 rounds. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the dust storm take 1d6 slashing damage. Creatures that have the water trait or that are made primarily of liquid take double damage. --- Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.
